---
title: "trash"
output: pdf_document
---



```{r}
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
dt <- mtcars[rep(1:5, 10), 1:6]

dt_footnote <- dt
names(dt_footnote)[2] <- paste0(names(dt_footnote)[2], 
                                footnote_marker_symbol(2))
row.names(dt_footnote)[4] <- paste0(row.names(dt_footnote)[4], 
                                footnote_marker_alphabet(1))
kable(dt_footnote, align = "c", longtable=T, booktabs=T,
      # Remember this escape = F
      escape = F) %>%
  kable_styling(full_width = F) %>%
  footnote(alphabet = "Footnote A; ",
           symbol = "Footnote Symbol 1; ",
           alphabet_title = "Type II: ", symbol_title = "Type III: ",
           footnote_as_chunk = T)
```
